member.name: T:Flurl.Http.Configuration.DefaultHttpClientFactory
member.summary: Default implementation of IHttpClientFactory used by FlurlHttp. The created HttpClient includes hooks that enable FlurlHttp's testing features and respect its configuration settings. Therefore, custom factories should inherit from this class, rather than implementing IHttpClientFactory directly.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Configuration.DefaultHttpClientFactory.CreateHttpClient(System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler)
member.summary: Override in custom factory to customize the creation of HttpClient used in all Flurl HTTP calls. In order not to lose Flurl.Http functionality, it is recommended to call base.CreateClient and customize the result.

member.name: M:Flurl.Http.Configuration.DefaultHttpClientFactory.CreateMessageHandler
member.summary: Override in custom factory to customize the creation of HttpClientHandler used in all Flurl HTTP calls. In order not to lose Flurl.Http functionality, it is recommended to call base.CreateMessageHandler and customize the result.
